result.eng: We were in the same class together.
result.ga: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.orig: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.html: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéileWe were in the same class together.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid in aon rang le ċéileWe were in the same class together.

result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ga: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.orig: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.html: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orainn codlaḋ in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.eng: They asked me the same question again and again.
result.ga: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.orig: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arís
result.html: Chuir siad an cheist chéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad an ċeist ċéanna orm arís agus arísThey asked me the same question again and again.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.html: Gurb amhlaidh duitseSame to you!
result.ponchtml: Gurb aṁlaiḋ duitseSame to you!

result.eng: As it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ga: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.orig: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.html: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ponchtml: Mar a ṫarlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa ċoṁlaċt céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.

result.eng: Immigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ga: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.orig: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.html: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaighImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ponchtml: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimirciġ agus atá ag na saoránaiġImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.

result.html: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: I've been working in the same place for five years.
result.ga: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.orig: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.html: Tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig blianaI've been working in the same place for five years.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag obair san áit ċéanna le cúig blianaI've been working in the same place for five years.

result.html: Tá siad ar aon mhéidThey are the same size.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ar aon ṁéidThey are the same size.

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: Same to you. [response to a well-wish]
result.html: Go mba hé duitSame to you. [response to a well-wish]
result.ponchtml: Go mba hé duitSame to you. [response to a well-wish]

result.eng: We are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ga: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.orig: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.html: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ponchtml: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nascṫa tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: We went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: The TV presenters were of the same opinion.
result.ga: Bhí na láithreoirí teilifíse den tuairim chéanna
result.orig: Bhí na láithreoirí teilifíse den tuairim chéanna
result.html: Bhí na láithreoirí teilifíse den tuairim chéannaThe TV presenters were of the same opinion.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na láiṫreoirí teilifíse den tuairim ċéannaThe TV presenters were of the same opinion.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
